original_title: Quanto Vale ou é Por Quilo?
overview: Free adaptation of Machado de Assis's short story "Pai Contra Mãe", having some of Nireu Cavalcanti's 18th Century chronicles as inspiration, the film traces parallels between life in during the slavery period and in modern Brazil.
tagline: A poor in the hand is worth two in the theft
title: What Is It Worth?
